file.name: issue_8045.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: "1.0.0"
  title: reactive-spring-boot-request-body-issue
tags:
  - name: ReactiveSpringBootRequestBodyIssue
paths:
  /some/dummy/endpoint:
    post:
      tags:
        - ReactiveSpringBootRequestBodyIssue
      requestBody:
        description: request
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              additionalProperties:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/DummyRequest'
        required: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successfully created reverse listings for retail
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                additionalProperties:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/DummyResponse'
components:
  schemas:
    DummyResponse:
      required:
        - status
      type: object
      properties:
        status:
          type: string
    DummyRequest:
      required:
        - product_id
      type: object
      properties:
        product_id:
          type: string
